Double walled stainless steel thermal carafe holds temperature for a fresh cup of coffee every time
Removable water reservoir for easy filling and cleaning
Strong Brew Selector for a bolder cup of coffee
body.description: This Mr. Coffee® 10-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker uses Optimal Brew to brew coffee hotter and faster for the fullest, richest flavor extraction—and a great-tasting cup. The Strong Brew selector offers the option for a bolder cup of coffee, and the Brew Later feature allows you to wake up to fresh-brewed coffee whenever you want. More great features include a stainless steel thermal carafe to keep coffee hot for hours; Grab-a-Cup Auto Pause, so you can get a cup mid-brew; a convenient freshness timer; and a water filtration system for the best possible taste.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brew a Bolder Cup of Coffee with the Touch of a Button Optimal Brew Brew coffee hotter and faster with Optimal Brew. It provides the fullest, richest flavor extraction—and a great tasting cup of coffee every time—with its high brew temperature of 205 degrees F and 20% faster brew speed.* *compared to BVMC-SJX39 Thermal Carafe The double-walled, thermal, stainless steel carafe keeps coffee hot for hours. Strong Brew Selector Prefer a bolder flavor? It's easy to make a stronger cup of coffee with the Strong Brew selector. Key Features Powered by Optimal Brew for full flavor extraction Double-walled thermal carafe Strong Brew selector Programmable Brew Now and Brew Later presets Grab-a-Cup Auto Pause Freshness timer Removable reservoir Water filtration system

Enjoy a Great Cup of Coffee at the Perfect Time for You Brew Now or Brew Later The Brew Now or Brew Later feature lets you set the coffee maker ahead of time and wake up to freshly brewed coffee. Auto Pause Grab-a-Cup Auto Pause lets you enjoy a cup of coffee before the brewing is done. Freshness Timer The freshness timer monitors how long it has been since the coffee was brewed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I replaced an older model Mr. Coffee coffee maker with a hot plate with this updated thermos style, and we absolutely love it. Since Covid and WFH we started making pots of coffee and got away from our single pod coffee maker. With our old coffee maker with the hot plate, it didn’t have an outo shut off and once it got below half a carafe it would end up burning the coffee if you left it more than an hour. This carafe keeps it hot for hours (4-5 hrs in our case, everyones idea of hot is different). It makes great coffee, hot, flavorful and when we want an extra boast we use the strong brew setting. You also use less coffee with this machine. For a 10 cup pot you use 7.5 tablespoons. I’m so used to the old way one tbsp per cup and an extra for the pot.I’m very happy with all the features - brew later setting, strong brew option, freshness timer to let you know how long ago your coffee was brewed, and auto clean function.After 3 1/2 months it still looks new. Just a little stainless steel polish keeps the carafe spotless.This was a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Given our mineral-laden water, we've gone through many coffee makers. We chose this one thinking that a thermal carafe might lessen mineral deposits in heating coil as heat would be off once brewing finished. This might be what's helping as we've cleaned only when the maker indicates to do so (one time so far, and it was easy to do given built-in process). Coffee is good, stays hot for over an hour. Not sure why, but this maker is easier to take care of, basket easier to wash, rinse. In general, a good maker, better than the many we've had in past. Oh, another nice feature is that it's quiet while brewing, a little signal when coffee is finished.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Coffee Maker with Great Features at a Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Mr Coffee BVMC-PSTX91 to replace an older machine. My primary consideration in purchasing this machine was the thermal carafe. I did research into several similar machines but ultimately went with this one due to previous experience with this brand and the price. Several weeks into its use, I have no complaints and I'm completely satisfied. Here are some thoughts and highlights:Thermal Carafe: optimal coffee temperature (according to the packaging) is two hours but I have found that coffee that is 6 hours old is still hot enough to enjoy without reheating or getting a burned taste. The carafe is a thermos that maintains freshly brewed quality for hours without a heating element. My hands are a bit big so it is not easy to get my hand into the opening to clean but a brush quickly solves that problem. The carafe can also be placed on a table, counter, etc and take a bit of abuse since it is stainless steel.Brew basket: pulls out from the side for easy access. I use paper filters but a reusable filter would work well. I'm currently using the filter that was provided with the machine but I'm going to discontinue its use once it is used up since I have filtered water. It does not appear to affect the operation.Brew Time: the machine brews fast with a total time of approximately 8 minutes for "10" cups of coffee.Brew System: there is a rubber/silicone hood that connects the machine to the carafe to minimize exposure to the air to maximize temperature. The first few cups of coffee are extremely hot so it does work well. I can also pour a cup while it is brewing with no issues (though I use the delay brew feature so coffee is ready when I get up).You do have to use a little more coffee to get a stronger brew if that's what you like. It seems to be a "feature" of this style machine that it brews slightly weaker coffee.I have two small complaints but not enough to take a star. First, I don't like the chimes that first sound at the end of the brew cycle and then 2 hours later when the optimal quality time has passed. I will finish the coffee whether or not the quality time period has passed. While minor, I wish it could be disabled. Second, the water tank can be removed for easy filling but it is awkward when filled and water splashes. I choose to pour water into the tank without removing it but it would be a nice feature if the lid would seal to minimize splashing.Overall, if you want a quality machine that brews a great cup of coffee and maintains your coffee temperature for hours, this is the machine for you. It uses minimal electricity since there is no heating element so there is no chance of forgetting to turn the machine off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a very nice coffee maker that keeps the coffee hot and doesn't burn the coffee.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice coffee maker. It runs extra hot (205 degrees!) very quickly. The coffee maker turns off the "hot plate" after two hours but the carafe is so well designed the coffee will still stay hot the next day!My only disappointments are - first it's kinda pricey for a coffee maker - I'd be OK with it if it held up better. After about five years (because it runs extra hot I guess) it will begin leaking not from the reservoir but from the brewing section (it leaks cold water though) - Mr Coffee knows about this but it will be out of warranty for a couple of years before it needs replacement (I guess it's worth it).It angers me that Mr Coffee is very well aware of this defective design though - but since I've never had as good a coffee maker as this one before I'm spoiled so this is my replacement for the exact same one I bought about five years ago.

reviews.reviewTitle: Chegou de acordo com o pedido

reviews.reviewText: El café se mantiene caliente por 4 horas sin problema, la jarra no me gusta ya que queda liquido dentro por la forma del recipiente y la tapa; el tema de los filtros que se cambian cada mes es un punto a considerar. Se programa muy fácil y se limpia de igual manera.

Bought this 5 years ago. ($79.00 in 2017). Best coffee maker I have ever owned. I can still brew a full pot in the evening and it remains piping hot in the morning and since it has not been on a burner overnight, the flavor is still great. Full pot stays hot (not warm......hot) for 10+ hours. A half pot stays hot for 4+ hours. A quarter pot stays hot for 1-2hours. The removable water reservoir is great. I can't imagine going back to the days of having to pour water into a built in reservoir.Everything still works after an estimated 3,000 pots of coffee made over 5 years. The flimsy lid to the reservoir broke when it fell to the ground in 2018. Black duct tape fixed it and it has been good since. The rubber seal around the coffe pot lid wore out after a few years. I substituted with an elastic band and it works fine. I have never used the timer feature. The only technical flaw is that the counter used to indicate when you should run a cleaning cycle resets if you unplug the unit, I just run a cleaining cycle once a month instead.

Tengo 4 meses de uso y hasta ahora es una excelente cafetera. Llegó en perfecto estado a casa, requiere filtros de papel yo uso uno de plastico de Mr. Coffee y le quedó muy bien. Cumple con su principal función de mantener el café caliente sin que se re-queme, es de bonito diseño (las visitas la aman) respecto a los comentarios que "se derrama" eso sucede cuando no la utilizan adecuadamente ya nos paso una ocasión y fue porque la persona que la cargó puso café y agua demás. Hasta ahora una muy buena adquisición.
到着も思ったより早くて、すぐに使えた事と、説明書の日本語記載はなかったですけど、ボタンをイジれば簡単に分かりました☆デザインもかっこ良くて大変気に入りました☆
